root.name: Super Robot Pinball
root.description: Featured Series/RobotsA list of anime series featured in the game and the robot allies that they contribute.Mobile Suit Gundam: Gundam, Guntank, Guncannon Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam: Gundam Mk. II, Hyaku Shiki, Zeta Gundam Mobile Suit Gundam ZZ: ZZ Gundam Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack: Nu Gundam New Mobile Report Gundam Wing: Wing Gundam, Wing Gundam Zero, Gundam Deathscythe, Gundam Heavyarms, Gundam Sandrock, Shenlong Gundam Mazinger Z: Mazinger Z Great Mazinger: Great Mazinger UFO Robo Grendizer: Grendizer Getter Robo: Getter-1, Getter-2. Getter-3 Getter Robo G: Getter Dragon, Getter Liger, Getter Posiden Shin Getter Robo (manga version): Shin Getter-1, Shin Getter-2, Shin Getter-3 Brave Raideen: Raideen Super Electromagnetic Robot Combattler V: Combattler V Super Electromagnetic Machine Voltes V: Voltes V Invincible Super Man Zambot 3: Zambot 3 Invincible Steel Man Daitarn 3: Daitarn 3 Combat Mecha Xabungle: Xabungle, Walker Gallier Heavy Metal L-Gaim: L-Gaim, L-Gaim Mk. II Aura Battler Dunbine: Dunbine, Billvine Super Beast Machine God Dancougar: Dancougar Neon Genesis Evangelion: Eva-00, Eva-01, Eva-02 At the time of this game's release, Xabungle had not yet been included into the main Super Robot Wars series.
